extension.summary: Install the RAM FM Eighties Hit Radio XBMC add-on from the official repository
extension.description: RAM FM Eighties Hit Radio is a Non Profit Organisation run by volunteers.[CR][CR]Listening is free for everybody but running a radio station costs money.[CR][CR]We pay royalties for the artists that we play and there are costs for the website host and streaming server.[CR][CR]So if you like our radio station, feel free to show your support by making a small donation to help us cover our expenses..[CR][CR]Please visit www.ramfm.org and click on the [COLOR FFFF00FF]purple donate[/COLOR] button.
